actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $2,800 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earnings.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $2,800 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earnings under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $2,800 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earnings.
